results.message: The test `ansible-test sanity --test validate-modules` [[explain](https://docs.ansible.com/ansible-core/2.20/dev_guide/testing/sanity/validate-modules.html)] failed with 3 errors:

plugins/modules/ttl.py:0:0: doc-type-does-not-match-spec: Argument 'chdir' in argument_spec defines type as 'str' but documentation defines type as 'path'
plugins/modules/ttl.py:0:0: doc-type-does-not-match-spec: Argument 'filename' in argument_spec defines type as 'path' but documentation defines type as 'str'
